refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the text of the error message from previous MySQL operation

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the error text from the last MySQL function, or '' (the empty string) if no error occurred. If not connection is explicitely passed to the function, the last successful connection will be used to retrieve the error message from the MySQL server.

note.para: If the optional argument is specified the given link is used to retrieve the error message. If not, the last opened link is used.
